casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Floyd Jean DAVIS. No. 527P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2007. Floyd J. Davis, Pro Se. Laura J. Gendy, Assistant Attorney General, Jerry Wilson, District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 650 S.E.2d 612 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 29th day of October 2007 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed Without Prejudice by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of December 2007."
